subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tommy Bowden resigned as Clemson’s football coach Monday, telling Athletic Director Terry Don Phillips that he was stepping aside for the future of the program. Phillips said he was surprised by Bowden’s decision. “There wasn’t a gun to his head,” Phillips said.
